availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry C. Thomas (Louisville, KY, jail warden)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, jail warden. Kentucky native. Married to Julia Pope Thomas in Bullitt County, Kentucky, on May 24, 1833. Jail warden in Louisville in 1860. Assistant jailer in Louisville in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Sixth Manuscript Census of the United States (1840), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 478.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bullitt County, p. 214A.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bullitt County Marriages, Film #000482690, pp. 62-63.
Kentucky Death Records (Large Cities). Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Microfilm roll #7007127, Louisville Deaths, p. 28.
